column4: Hi, I can't seem to install Ubuntu properly - I've tried a number of different Live CD's but each time it keeps getting stuck on step 3/6 of installation. Can anyone pls help me??
be more specific .  nobody here memorizes what step 3 of 6 is
Step 3 is where it's asking you to choose the keyboard layout
It just won't move on past that screen - I can cancel it and start again, but the same thing happens.
